compatibility.notes: The Naumen license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the license text in all redistributions.
Retain the copyright notice in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
State any changes made to the original files.
license.name: Naumen
obligations: Retain copyright notice and list of conditions in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice and conditions in binary redistributions.
Obtain prior written permission from NAUMEN for endorsement or promotion using the name NAUMEN.
Include prominent notices in modified files stating changes and dates.
